Uses of Class
org.azeckoski.reflectutils.ClassData

Packages that use ClassData
org.azeckoski.reflectutils A set of reflection utilities and miscellaneous utilities related to working with classes and their fields with no dependencies which is compatible with java 1.5 and generics. 
 

Uses of ClassData in org.azeckoski.reflectutils
 

Methods in org.azeckoski.reflectutils that return ClassData
 ClassData<T> ClassFields.getClassData()
          SPECIAL METHOD: accesses the internal data
Gets the internal cache object for the class which holds all fields, methods, constructors, and annotations
<T> ClassData<T>
ClassDataCacher.getClassData(Class<T> cls)
          Convenience Method:
Gets the class data object which contains information about this class, will retrieve this from the class data cache if available or generate it if not
This is also available from the ClassFields object
<T> ClassData<T>
ClassDataCacher.getClassData(Object obj)
          Convenience Method:
Gets the class data object which contains information about this objects class, will retrieve this from the class data cache if available or generate it if not
This is also available from the ClassFields object
 

Methods in org.azeckoski.reflectutils with parameters of type ClassData
protected  Field FieldUtils.getFieldIfPossible(ClassData<?> cd, String name)
          Get the field if it exists for this class
